name: Total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures passed through to subrecipients, by highest degree granted and institutional control: FY 2023
description: Total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures passed through to subrecipients, by highest degree granted and institutional control: FY 2023

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_expenditures_passed_through_to_subrecipients_total
variableMeasured.description: R D Expenditures Passed Through To Subrecipients Total

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_expenditures_passed_through_to_subrecipients_to_higher_education_subrecipients
variableMeasured.description: R D Expenditures Passed Through To Subrecipients To Higher Education Subrecipients

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_expenditures_passed_through_to_subrecipients_to_businesses
variableMeasured.description: R D Expenditures Passed Through To Subrecipients To Businesses

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_expenditures_passed_through_to_subrecipients_to_nonprofit_organizations
variableMeasured.description: R D Expenditures Passed Through To Subrecipients To Nonprofit Organizations

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_expenditures_passed_through_to_subrecipients_to_other_subrecipients
variableMeasured.description: R D Expenditures Passed Through To Subrecipients To Other Subrecipients

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: This table includes only institutions reporting $1 million or more in total R&D expenditures in 2022. Institutions reporting less than $1 million in total R&D expenditures in 2022 completed a shorter version of the survey form in FY 2023, and that form requested R&D expenditures passed through only to higher education institutions. For a list of R&D expenditures passed through to higher education institutions at institutions completing the shorter version of the survey, see table 86.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Higher Education Research and Development Survey, FY 2023.
